title: Bloomberg Markets: Bob Wright Says Trump `Business Oriented'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bob Wright Says Trump `Business Oriented'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Robert Wright\u0010Founder\u0010The Suzanne Wright Foundation\u0010Former Chairman & CEO of NBC Universal and Vice Chairman of General Electric\u0010Discussing the CodePurple campaign, a Suzanne Wright Foundation Initiative, dedicated to driving urgency and action in the fight against pancreatic cancer, and working with the White House to achieve those goals.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
